****************************************
REFER TO MIPS TEMPLATE.TXT FOR ADDITIONAL INSTRUCTIONS
****************************************

-- SW $t1 2($t0)		\		$t0 = 0, $t1 = 1
101011 00000 00001 0000000000000010
ac010002

-- LW $t2 2($t0)		\		$t2 = 1
100011 00000 00010 0000000000000010
8c020002

-- ADD $t3 $t1 $t2	\		$t3 = 2
000000 00001 00010 00011  00000 100000
00221820

-- ADD $t4 $t3 $t3	\		$t4 = 4
000000 00011 00011 00100  00000 100001
00632021

-- SUB $t5 $t4 $t1	\		$t5 = 3
000000 00100 00001 00101  00000 100010
00812822

-- SUB $t6 $t4 $t3	\		$t6 = 2
000000 00100 00011 00110  00000 100011
00833023

-- AND $t7 $t6 $t4	\ 		$t7 = 0
000000 00110 00100 00111 00000 100100 
00c43824

-- OR $t8 $t6 $t4		\ 		$t8 = 6
000000 00110 00100 01000 00000 100101 
00c44025

-- XOR $t9 $t6 $t4	\ 		$t9 = 6
000000 00110 00100 01001 00000 100110 
00c44826

-- NOR $t10 $t0 $t31	\ 		$t10 = 0
000000 00000 11111 01010 00000 100111
001f5027

-- SLT $t11 $t6 $t4	\ 		$t11 = 1
000000 00110 00100 01011 00000 101000
00c45828

-- SLT $t12 $t6 $t31\ 		$t11 = 1
000000 00110 11111 01100 00000 101000
00dF5828

-- SLTU $t13 $t6 $t4\ 		$t12 = 1
000000 00110 00100 01101 00000 101001
00c46029

--addi        $t6=2  $t14 = 2+12 = 14    
001001 00110 01110 00000 00000 001100
24ce000c

--andi $t14=14 &t15= 14 and 12 =12
001100 01110 01111 00000 00000 001100
31cf000c

--ORI &t15=12 &t16=12 or 2=14
001101 01111 10000 00000 00000 000010
35f00002

--XORI &t16=14 &t17=14 xor 1=001111
001110 10000 10001 00000 00000 000001
3a110001

--LUI $t18=65536
001111 00000 10010 00000 00000 000001
3c120001

--SLTI &t17=001111 t17<010000 t19=1
001010 10001 10011  00000 00000 010000
2a330010

--SLTIU t17>001000 t19=0
001011 10001 10011  00000 00000 001000
2e330008

--SB $t31 40($t0)
1010 00 00000 11111 0000000000101000
a01f0028

--LB $t20 40($t0)		\ $t20 = FFFFFFFF
100000 00000 10100 0000000000101000
80140028

--LBU $t21 40($t0)		\ $t21 = 000000FF
100100 00000 10101 0000000000101000
90150028

--SH $t31 41($t0)
1010 01 00000 11111 0000000000101001
a41f0029

--LH $t22 41($t0)		\ $t22 = FFFFFFFF
100001 00000 10110 0000000000101001
84160029

--LHU $t23 41($t0)		\ $t23 = 0000FFFF
100101 00000 10111 0000000000101001
94170029

-- SLL $t7 $t8 2			\ $t7 = 24
000000 00000 01000 00111 00010 000000
00083880

-- SRL $t8 $t14 3			\ $t8 = 1
000000 00000 01110 01000 00011 000010
000e40c2

-- SRA $t10 $t14 1		\ $t10 = 7
000000 00000 01110 01010 00001 000011
000e5043

-- SLLV $t1 $t7 $t5			\ $t1 = 192
000000 00101 00111 00001 00010 000100
00a70884

-- SRLV $t2 $t14 $t5			\ $t2 = 1
000000 00101 01110 00010 00011 000110
00ae10c6

-- SRAV $t3 $t14 $t5		\ $t3 = 1
000000 00101 01110 00011 00001 000111
00ae1847

-- J 0
0000 10 00000000000000000000000000
08000000

-- JAL 5
0000 11 00000000000000000000000101
0c000005

JR	 $7		
0000 00 00 111 0 0000 0000 0000 0000 1000
00e00008

JALR	 $t7
0000 00 00 111 0 0000 0000 0000 0000 1001
00e00009






---------------------------------------------------
-- OR $4 $7 $3
000000 00111 00011 00100 000 0010 0101
00e32025


-- SW $t2 2($t0)		\		$t0 = 0, $t1 = 1
101011 00000 00010 0000000000000010
ac020002

-- LW $t6 2($t0)		\		$t2 = 1
100011 00000 00110 0000000000000010
8c060002

-- SUB $1 $6 $7
0000 00 00110 00111 00001 000 00 10 0010
00c70822

-- OR $8 $4 $6
0000 00 00100 00110 01000 000 0010 0101
00864025

-- SUB $9 $6 $zero
0000 00 00110 00000 01001 000 0010 0010
00c04822

BEQ $4 $8 2	
0001 00 00100 01000 0000 0000 0000 0010	
10880002

-- ADDI        $t6=5  		$t14 = 5+12 = 17    
001001 00110 01110 00000 00000 001100
24ce000c
